channel.title: Ladders making people crash

item.title: Ladders making people crash
item.dc:creator: @rosejuice rosejuice
item.description:
@rosejuice wrote:

My ladders seem to be making people crash (PI)
People click a ladder, and it comes up with a loading screen forcing them to restart their client, after they rejoin they appear where they wanted to go. Anyone know of a fix? I searched for a while but no luck.

case 4494: if (c.heightLevel == 2) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX - 5, c.absY, 1); } else if (c.heightLevel == 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX + 5, c.absY, 0); } break;

Read full topic
